Hania Rani - Full Performance (Live on KEXP) [July 2022]

KEXP presents Hania Rani performing live in the KEXP studio.
Recorded July 9, 2022.

Songs:
24.03
Ghosts
Komeda Part 3
Buka

Host: DJ Alex
KEXP Engineers: Agata Dankowska & Jon Roberts

Editor: Scott Holpainen
